item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is the WIKI of the 101st “Hell” Battalion, the most active Helldivers 2 Millsim Server. After retiring from active duty in the 51st Inferno Battalion “Mind” assume command of the 101st Hell Battalion The 101st Hell Battalion was a ragtag and disorganized group, often ridiculed and underestimated by their peers.

item.description: Temporary Note Someone smart probably: there is nothing more permanent than a temporary solution If you want to contribute a new note to the wiki it is important that you remember that: ...

item.title: Sanction System
item.description: In the spirit of maintaining discipline and order, violations of our sacred code will not go unpunished. Our Commanding Officers (COs) shall mete out justice with a firm yet fair hand, employing a system of warning points commensurate with the transgression.

item.title: Heat Classes
item.description: In this document we will be detailing the parameters around the H.E.A.T. Training system. Index Offense Area of Effect Infantry Light Anti-Tank Support Heavy Anti-Tank Supressive Quartermaster Defence Stationary Defense Mobile Defense Passive Defense Scout Radar Scavenger Demolitionist Mechanized Exo-suits Armored Personnel Carriers All Terrain Vehicles The system is broken down into 5 Tiers.

item.title: H.E.A.T. Resources
item.description: Challenges for HEAT HEAT Certification Rules 101st “Hell” Battalion Basic Certification Classes Guide H.E.A.T. Certification Request Template **Callsign:**[Ping Yourself] **Certification Requested: **[Tier + Class] **Availability:** [Time] Reason for seeking training: [Give us some lore; bring a little RP into here] Remember to Ping yourself The availability time should be formatted in UTC +2 or using Discord date picker .
